+ Hello and welcome!

[[<image Animation6.gif width="200px"]]
+++++ This is the artwork page of [[*user organicatom]]
+++++ My name is Morgan, or Ro --(pronounced "row")-- , and i'm a hobbyist drawing fanart in my spare time.

+++++ Most of my online presence is spent outside of the wiki. You can find me on...

++++++ >[https://twitter.com/organicatom__ Twitter]

++++++ >[https://www.tumblr.com/blog/0rganicatom Tumblr]

++++++ >[https://bsky.app/profile/0rganicatom.bsky.social Bluesky]

------
[[Size larger]]**//NOTE://**[[/size]]

> It might look barren, but i'm planning to expand this page bit by bit, slowly but surely!
